Open navigation

Ukraine

Non-governmental organization “UFuture“

Collection and distribution of aid to war-affected areas, as well as assistance to refugees in our hometown of Khmelnytsky, Ukraine.

Home

Who we are

About us

Our volunteer organization is based in Khmelnytsky in the west-central part of Ukraine. We help support regional shelters, hospitals and supply other cities affected by the war with Russia

The city of Khmelnytsky has become one of the most popular places of refuge for those fleeing the war from the eastern and northern regions of Ukraine.

We help maintain regional shelters, hospitals and supply other cities affected by the war with Russia

What we do

Our mission

Humanitarian aid to refugees

Our assistance provides urgent, life-saving support, including food, shelter, safe drinking water, improved sanitation and hygiene, emergency.

Emergency healthcare services, child protection programs, and education, among other activities:

  • Including food, shelter, safe drinking water, improved.
  • Provides resources and networking opportunities for past.
  • Find exchange programs for both domestic and foreign audiences.

Social projects

Our assistance provides urgent, life-saving support, including food, shelter, safe drinking water, improved sanitation and hygiene, emergency.

Emergency healthcare services, child protection programs, and education, among other activities:

  • Including food, shelter, safe drinking water, improved.
  • Provides resources and networking opportunities for past.
  • Find exchange programs for both domestic and foreign audiences.

Assistance to hospitals and the army
